## Recent Publications & Talks

- [New paper: PCS workflow for veridical data science in the age of AI (Z. Rewolinski and B. Yu, 2025)](https://www.stat.berkeley.edu/~yugroup/pubs/pcs_workflow-6.pdf)
- [Veridical data science and medical foundation models](https://arxiv.org/abs/2409.10580) on arXiv by Alaa and Yu.
- [VDS book review](https://hdsr.mitpress.mit.edu/pub/5322mn1e/release/3) by Yuval and Yoav Benjamini in Harvard Data Science Review (HDSR)-- "pedagogical excellence, diverse examples, and projects make Veridical Data Science a suitable textbook for students of all levels, in addition to being a valuable resource for data scientists in general" (review summary in HDSR Editor-in-Chief's note), June, 2024.
- ["Veridical data science towards trustworthy AI"](https://ww2.amstat.org/meetings/jsm/2023/webcasts/index.cfm) (Talk video of COPSS DAAL (formerly Fisher Award and Lecture), scroll down), Aug. JSM in Toronto, 2023.
- [Veridical data science](https://www.pnas.org/content/117/8/3920) (PCS framework: [v-flow code](https://github.com/Yu-Group/veridical-flow) and [documentation template](https://yu-group.github.io/vdocs/PCSDoc-Template.html)), PNAS, 2020 ([QnAs with Bin Yu](https://www.pnas.org/content/117/8/3893))
- My co-author [Rebecca Barter](https://rebeccabarter.com/) and I are thrilled to announce the [online release](http://vdsbook.com/) of our MIT Press book ["Veridical Data Science: The Practice of Responsible Data Analysis and Decision Making"](https://mitpress.mit.edu/9780262049191/veridical-data-science/), an essential source for producing trustworthy data-driven results (Feb. 28, 2024).
